message.content:
The lineage relationships provided indicate that both Arthur and Mary share Jordan as a common ancestor.

- For Arthur: Jordan is an ancestor of Jessica (since Jessica is Jordan's descendant). Jessica is an ancestor of Gerald (since Jessica is Gerald's ancestor). Gerald is an ancestor of Nancy (since Nancy is Gerald's descendant). Nancy is an ancestor of Gregory (since Gregory is Nancy's descendant). Gregory is an ancestor of Steven (since Steven is Gregory's descendant). Steven is an ancestor of Justin (since Steven is Justin's ancestor). Justin is an ancestor of Rebecca (since Justin is Rebecca's ancestor). Rebecca is an ancestor of Doris (since Doris is Rebecca's descendant). Doris is an ancestor of Jesse (since Jesse is Doris's descendant). Jesse is an ancestor of Austin (since Austin is Jesse's descendant). Austin is an ancestor of Stephen (since Stephen is Austin's descendant). Stephen is an ancestor of Charlotte (since Charlotte is Stephen's descendant). Charlotte is an ancestor of Bradley (since Charlotte is Bradley's ancestor). Bradley is an ancestor of Kathryn (since Kathryn is Bradley's descendant). Kathryn is an ancestor of Alexander (since Kathryn is Alexander's ancestor). Alexander is an ancestor of Shirley (since Shirley is Alexander's descendant). Shirley is an ancestor of Janet (since Shirley is Janet's ancestor). Janet is an ancestor of Jeremy (since Jeremy is Janet's descendant). Jeremy is an ancestor of Debra (since Debra is Jeremy's descendant). Debra is an ancestor of Amber (since Amber is Debra's descendant). Amber is an ancestor of Kevin (since Amber is Kevin's ancestor). Kevin is an ancestor of Eugene (since Eugene is Kevin's descendant). Eugene is an ancestor of Barbara (since Eugene is Barbara's ancestor). Barbara is an ancestor of Arthur (since Barbara is Arthur's ancestor).

- For Mary: Jordan is an ancestor of Deborah (since Jordan is Deborah's ancestor). Deborah is an ancestor of Joshua (since Deborah is Joshua's ancestor). Joshua is an ancestor of Mason (since Joshua is Mason's ancestor). Mason is an ancestor of Christian (since Mason is Christian's ancestor). Christian is an ancestor of Walter (since Christian is Walter's ancestor). Walter is an ancestor of Joan (since Joan is Walter's descendant). Joan is an ancestor of Isabella (since Isabella is Joan's descendant). Isabella is an ancestor of Julie (since Isabella is Julie's ancestor). Julie is an ancestor of Lauren (since Lauren is Julie's descendant). Lauren is an ancestor of Tyler (since Tyler is Lauren's descendant). Tyler is an ancestor of Emily (since Tyler is Emily's ancestor). Emily is an ancestor of Edward (since Emily is Edward's ancestor). Edward is an ancestor of Jonathan (since Edward is Jonathan's ancestor). Jonathan is an ancestor of Grace (since Grace is Jonathan's descendant). Grace is an ancestor of Robert (since Grace is Robert's ancestor). Robert is an ancestor of Patricia (since Patricia is Robert's descendant). Patricia is an ancestor of Juan (since Patricia is Juan's ancestor). Juan is an ancestor of Marilyn (since Juan is Marilyn's ancestor). Marilyn is an ancestor of Alan (since Alan is Marilyn's descendant). Alan is an ancestor of Betty (since Alan is Betty's ancestor). Betty is an ancestor of Kelly (since Kelly is Betty's descendant). Kelly is an ancestor of Lisa (since Lisa is Kelly's descendant). Lisa is an ancestor of Jacqueline (since Lisa is Jacqueline's ancestor). Jacqueline is an ancestor of Judith (since Jacqueline is Judith's ancestor). Judith is an ancestor of Beverly (since Beverly is Judith's descendant). Beverly is an ancestor of Joe (since Joe is Beverly's descendant). Joe is an ancestor of Aaron (since Joe is Aaron's ancestor). Aaron is an ancestor of Melissa (since Aaron is Melissa's ancestor). Melissa is an ancestor of Bruce (since Bruce is Melissa's descendant). Bruce is an ancestor of Frank (since Frank is Bruce's descendant). Frank is an ancestor of Christina (since Frank is Christina's ancestor). Christina is an ancestor of Gabriel (since Gabriel is Christina's descendant). Gabriel is an ancestor of Marie (since Gabriel is Marie's ancestor). Marie is an ancestor of Dorothy (since Dorothy is Marie's descendant). Dorothy is an ancestor of Diana (since Diana is Dorothy's descendant). Diana is an ancestor of Logan (since Logan is Diana's descendant). Logan is an ancestor of Russell (since Logan is Russell's ancestor). Russell is an ancestor of Carl (since Russell is Carl's ancestor). Carl is an ancestor of Mary (since Mary is Carl's descendant).

Since both Arthur and Mary have Jordan as a common ancestor, they share a common ancestor. None of the other options are correct:
- Arthur is not Mary's ancestor, as Arthur's lineage does not include Mary.
- Arthur is not Mary's descendant, as Mary's lineage does not include Arthur.
- There is no evidence of a common descendant shared by Arthur and Mary, as the relationships do not indicate any descendant of both.
- "None of the above" is incorrect because option 4 is correct.

<ANSWER>4</ANSWER>
